message: Let's start fair. I'll take 90, you take 10. We can always negotiate more later if you want.
I think I can do better than that. Your turn to negotiate!
I'm willing to compromise, let's split it 60/40.  We're both losing money with each round, so it's in our best interest to reach an agreement.
I'm not willing to give up more than 45. You're getting a better deal than you were in round 2, so it's time to meet me in the middle.
